title: Hindu religion a menace not only to India, but to the entire world, is reason for the global disease called caste: DMK MP A Raja
comments:
I do not agree with what he said about entire religion.

But caste? How the duck did we spread caste to USA; and so much that laws are brought against it! Our people practising professional discrimination in a country that has strong laws against discrimination.
